page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: We live in and around a very rural part of{Wiltshire}in the south of {England. The land around is mainly agricultural and it is still possible to find people engaged in rural crafts. We found it very interesting interveiwing local inhabitants of the area that we have always known, but never realised how much they know about the locality. The places we looked at in detail are typical of the area. We have no large industries or over powering buildings to spoil the natural serenity of the surroundings. The largest village in our block is {Tisbury}and it was possible for us to study the life and surroundings of a typically rural community.
